00040 static const unsigned int HELP_MARGIN = 2;
00041 static const unsigned int HELP_OFFSET = 15;
00042 static const unsigned int HISTORY_PAGE = 5;
00043 static const unsigned int HISTORY_STACK_SIZE = 100;

00045 static const TraceClass TRACE_SHELL("SHELL", "Shell traces");

00047 
00048 Shell::Shell(const Cli& CLI_Cli)
00049   : m_pcliCli(& CLI_Cli), m_pcliInput(NULL),
00050     m_eLang(Help::LANG_EN), m_bBeep(true),
00051     m_iHistoryIndex(0)
00052 {
00053     EnsureCommonDevices();
00054     EnsureTraces();
00055 
00056     for (int i=0; i<STREAM_TYPES_COUNT; i++)
00057     {
00058         m_artStream[i].pcliStream = NULL;
00059         m_artStream[i].bEnable = true;
00060     }
00061 
00062     m_vstrHistory.insert(m_vstrHistory.begin(), m_strLine);
00063 
00064     m_vpcliMenus.push_back(& CLI_Cli);
00065     CLI_Cli.SetShell(*this);
00066 
00067     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_SHELL) << "New shell for CLI '" << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "'." << cli::endl;
00068 }
00069 
00070 Shell::~Shell(void)
00071 {
00072     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_SHELL) << "Shell deleted for CLI '" << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "'." << cli::endl;
00073 
00074     if (m_pcliInput != NULL)
00075     {
00076         m_pcliInput->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00077         m_pcliInput = NULL;
00078     }
00079 
00080     for (int i=0; i<STREAM_TYPES_COUNT; i++)
00081     {
00082         if (m_artStream[i].pcliStream != NULL)
00083         {
00084             m_artStream[i].pcliStream->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00085             m_artStream[i].pcliStream = NULL;
00086         }
00087     }
00088 }

00090 const Cli& Shell::GetCli(void) const
00091 {
00092     assert(m_pcliCli != NULL);
00093     return *m_pcliCli;
00094 }
00095 
00096 const OutputDevice& Shell::GetStream(const STREAM_TYPE E_StreamType) const
00097 {
00098     if ((E_StreamType >= 0) && (E_StreamType < STREAM_TYPES_COUNT))
00099     {
00100         if (m_artStream[E_StreamType].bEnable)
00101         {
00102             if (const IOMux* const pcli_IOMux = dynamic_cast<const IOMux*>(m_artStream[E_StreamType].pcliStream))
00103             {
00104                 // This is a hack to have IOMux multiplexing outputs correctly.
00105                 return pcli_IOMux->GetOutput(E_StreamType);
00106             }
00107             else if (m_artStream[E_StreamType].pcliStream != NULL)
00108             {
00109                 return *m_artStream[E_StreamType].pcliStream;
00110             }
00111         }
00112     }
00113 
00114     // Default to null device.
00115     return OutputDevice::GetNullDevice();
00116 }
00117 
00118 const bool Shell::SetStream(const STREAM_TYPE E_StreamType, OutputDevice& CLI_Stream)
00119 {
00120     if ((E_StreamType < 0) || (E_StreamType >= STREAM_TYPES_COUNT))
00121     {
00122         return false;
00123     }
00124     else
00125     {
00126         // Free previous reference.
00127         if (OutputDevice* const pcli_Stream = m_artStream[E_StreamType].pcliStream)
00128         {
00129             bool b_Res = true;
00130 
00131             // Unreference the device right now.
00132             m_artStream[E_StreamType].pcliStream = NULL;
00133             if (IsRunning())
00134             {
00135                 if (! pcli_Stream->CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__))
00136                 {
00137                     b_Res = false;
00138                 }
00139             }
00140             pcli_Stream->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00141 
00142             if (! b_Res)
00143             {
00144                 // Abort on error.
00145                 return false;
00146             }
00147         }
00148 
00149         // Store next reference.
00150         {
00151             CLI_Stream.UseInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00152             if (IsRunning())
00153             {
00154                 if (! CLI_Stream.OpenUp(__CALL_INFO__))
00155                 {
00156                     // Store nothing on error.
00157                     CLI_Stream.FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00158                     return false;
00159                 }
00160             }
00161             // Do not store the reference until opening is done.
00162             m_artStream[E_StreamType].pcliStream = & CLI_Stream;
00163         }
00164 
00165         return true;
00166     }
00167 }
00168 
00169 const bool Shell::StreamEnabled(const STREAM_TYPE E_StreamType) const
00170 {
00171     if ((E_StreamType < 0) || (E_StreamType >= STREAM_TYPES_COUNT))
00172     {
00173         return false;
00174     }
00175     else
00176     {
00177         return m_artStream[E_StreamType].bEnable;
00178     }
00179 }

00181 const bool Shell::EnableStream(const STREAM_TYPE E_StreamType, const bool B_Enable)
00182 {
00183     if ((E_StreamType < 0) || (E_StreamType >= STREAM_TYPES_COUNT))
00184     {
00185         return false;
00186     }
00187     else
00188     {
00189         m_artStream[E_StreamType].bEnable = B_Enable;
00190         return true;
00191     }
00192 }

00228 
00229 void Shell::Run(IODevice& CLI_IODevice)
00230 {
00231     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_SHELL) << "Shell for CLI '" << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "' starts running." << cli::endl;
00232     if (OpenDevices(CLI_IODevice))
00233     {
00234         if (! m_vpcliMenus.empty())
00235         {
00236             // Remember the CLI reference.
00237             const Cli* const pcli_Cli = dynamic_cast<const Cli*>(m_vpcliMenus[0]);
00238 
00239             PromptWelcomeMessage();
00240             PromptMenu();
00241             while (! m_vpcliMenus.empty())
00242             {
00243                 const KEY e_Key = CLI_IODevice.GetKey();
00244                 if (e_Key != NULL_KEY)
00245                 {
00246                     OnKey(e_Key);
00247                 }
00248                 else
00249                 {
00250                     m_vpcliMenus.erase(m_vpcliMenus.begin(), m_vpcliMenus.end());
00251                 }
00252             }
00253             PromptByeMessage();
00254 
00255             // Restore the CLI reference.
00256             m_vpcliMenus.push_back(pcli_Cli);
00257         }
00258         else
00259         {
00260             assert(false);
00261             GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << "No current menu!" << endl;
00262         }
00263     }
00264     CloseDevices(CLI_IODevice);
00265     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_SHELL) << "Shell for CLI '" << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "' end of run." << cli::endl;
00266 }
00267 
00268 const bool Shell::IsRunning(void) const
00269 {
00270     return (m_pcliInput != NULL);
00271 }

00278 const unsigned int Shell::GetHelpOffset(void) const
00279 {
00280     return HELP_OFFSET;

00282 
00283 const bool Shell::OpenDevices(IODevice& CLI_IODevice)
00284 {
00285     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_SHELL) << "Shell for CLI '" << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "' opening devices." << cli::endl;
00286 
00287     bool b_Res = true;
00288 
00289     // First of all, set references.
00290     {
00291         // Input.
00292         if (m_pcliInput != NULL)
00293         {
00294             m_pcliInput->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00295             m_pcliInput = NULL;
00296         }
00297         m_pcliInput = & CLI_IODevice;
00298         m_pcliInput->UseInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00299 
00300         // Output.
00301         for (int i=0; i<STREAM_TYPES_COUNT; i++)
00302         {
00303             if (m_artStream[i].pcliStream == NULL)
00304             {
00305                 m_artStream[i].pcliStream = & CLI_IODevice;
00306                 m_artStream[i].pcliStream->UseInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00307             }
00309             m_artStream[i].bEnable = true;
00310         }
00311     }
00312 
00313     // Then open up devices.
00314     {
00315         // Input.
00316         if ((m_pcliInput == NULL)
00317             || (! m_pcliInput->OpenUp(__CALL_INFO__)))
00318         {
00319             b_Res = false;
00320         }
00321 
00322         // Output.
00323         for (int i=0; i<STREAM_TYPES_COUNT; i++)
00324         {
00325             if ((m_artStream[i].pcliStream == NULL)
00326                 || (! m_artStream[i].pcliStream->OpenUp(__CALL_INFO__)))
00327             {
00328                 b_Res = false;
00329             }
00330         }
00331     }
00332 
00333     return b_Res;
00334 }
00335 
00336 const bool Shell::CloseDevices(IODevice& CLI_IODevice)
00337 {
00338     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_SHELL) << "Shell for CLI '" << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "' closing devices." << cli::endl;
00339 
00340     bool b_Res = true;
00341 
00342     // Close down devices.
00343     {
00344         // Output.
00345         for (int i=0; i<STREAM_TYPES_COUNT; i++)
00346         {
00347             if ((m_artStream[i].pcliStream != NULL)
00348                 && (! m_artStream[i].pcliStream->CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__)))
00349             {
00350                 b_Res = false;
00351             }
00352         }
00353 
00354         // Input device.
00355         if ((m_pcliInput != NULL)
00356             && (! m_pcliInput->CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__)))
00357         {
00358             b_Res = false;
00359         }
00360     }
00361 
00362     // Unset references.
00363     {
00364         // Output.
00365         for (int i=0; i<STREAM_TYPES_COUNT; i++)
00366         {
00367             if (m_artStream[i].pcliStream == & CLI_IODevice)
00368             {
00369                 m_artStream[i].pcliStream->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00370                 m_artStream[i].pcliStream = NULL;
00371             }
00372         }
00373 
00374         // Input.
00375         if (m_pcliInput != NULL)
00376         {
00377             m_pcliInput->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00378             m_pcliInput = NULL;
00379         }
00380     }
00381 
00382     return b_Res;
00383 }
00384 
00385 void Shell::PromptWelcomeMessage(void) const
00386 {
00387     if (! m_strWelcomeMessage.empty())
00388     {
00389         GetStream(WELCOME_STREAM) << m_strWelcomeMessage;
00390     }
00391     else
00392     {
00393         GetStream(WELCOME_STREAM)
00394         << "---------------------------------------------------" << endl
00395         << " Welcome to " << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "!" << endl
00396         << endl
00397         << " " << GetCli().GetKeyword() << " is a command line interface" << endl
00398         << " using the LGPL CLI library" << endl
00399         << "   (c) Alexis Royer http://alexis.royer.free.fr/CLI/" << endl
00400         << " Type 'help' at any time" << endl
00401         << " or press '?' or TAB to get completion or help." << endl
00402         << "---------------------------------------------------" << endl;
00403     }
00404 }
00405 
00406 void Shell::PromptByeMessage(void) const
00407 {
00408     if (! m_strByeMessage.empty())
00409     {
00410         GetStream(WELCOME_STREAM) << m_strByeMessage;
00411     }
00412     else
00413     {
00414         GetStream(WELCOME_STREAM) << "Bye!" << endl;
00415     }
00416 }
00417 
00418 void Shell::PromptMenu(void) const
00419 {
00420     if (! m_strNoDefaultPrompt.empty())
00421     {
00422         GetStream(PROMPT_STREAM) << m_strNoDefaultPrompt << m_strLine;
00423     }
00424     else
00425     {
00426         if (! m_vpcliMenus.empty())
00427         {
00428             GetStream(PROMPT_STREAM) << m_vpcliMenus.back()->GetKeyword() << ">";
00429             GetStream(ECHO_STREAM) << m_strLine;
00430         }
00431     }
00432 }
00433 
00434 void Shell::ExitMenu(void)
00435 {
00436     std::string str_Mem = m_strLine;
00437     m_strLine.erase();
00438     OnExit(false);
00439     m_strLine = str_Mem;
00440 }
00441 
00442 void Shell::Quit(void)
00443 {
00444     while (! m_vpcliMenus.empty())
00445     {
00446         ExitMenu();
00447     }
00448 }
00449 
00450 void Shell::DisplayHelp(void)
00451 {
00452     if (! m_vpcliMenus.empty())
00453     {
00454         const std::string str_Mem = m_strLine;
00455         m_strLine.erase();
00456         OnHelp(false, true);
00457         m_strLine = str_Mem;
00458     }
00459     else
00460     {
00461         assert(false);
00462         GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << "No current menu!" << endl;
00463     }
00464 }
00465 
00466 void Shell::PrintWorkingMenu(void)
00467 {
00468     unsigned int i = 0;
00469     for (i=0; i<HELP_MARGIN; i++)
00470     {
00471         GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << " ";
00472     }
00473     for (i=0; i<m_vpcliMenus.size(); i++)
00474     {
00475         GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << "/" << m_vpcliMenus[i]->GetKeyword();
00476     }
00477     GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << endl;
00478 }

00480 void Shell::EnterMenu(const Menu& CLI_Menu)
00481 {
00482     m_vpcliMenus.push_back(& CLI_Menu);
00483     PromptMenu();
00484 }
00485 
00486 void Shell::OnKey(const KEY E_KeyCode)
00487 {
00488     // In general, history navigation is lost.
00489     const int i_HistoryIndexBackup = m_iHistoryIndex;
00490     m_iHistoryIndex = 0;
00491 
00492     switch (E_KeyCode)
00493     {
00494     case KEY_UP:    m_iHistoryIndex = i_HistoryIndexBackup;
00495                     OnHistory(1);                   break;
00496     case KEY_DOWN:  m_iHistoryIndex = i_HistoryIndexBackup;
00497                     OnHistory(-1);                  break;
00498     case PAGE_UP:   m_iHistoryIndex = i_HistoryIndexBackup;
00499                     OnHistory(HISTORY_PAGE);        break;
00500     case PAGE_DOWN: m_iHistoryIndex = i_HistoryIndexBackup;
00501                     OnHistory(-HISTORY_PAGE);       break;
00502     case BACKSPACE: OnBackspace();                  break;
00503     case ENTER:     OnExecute();                    break;
00504     case BREAK:
00505     case ESCAPE:    OnEscape();                     break;
00506     case LOGOUT:    OnExit(true);                   break;
00507     case TAB:       OnHelp(true, false);            break;
00508     case QUESTION:
00509         if (m_strLine[m_strLine.size() - 1] == '\\')
00510             OnPrintableChar(E_KeyCode);
00511         else
00512             OnHelp(true, true);
00513         break;
00514 
00515     case KEY_a: case KEY_b: case KEY_c: case KEY_d: case KEY_e: case KEY_f:
00516     case KEY_g: case KEY_h: case KEY_i: case KEY_j: case KEY_k: case KEY_l:
00517     case KEY_m: case KEY_n: case KEY_o: case KEY_p: case KEY_q: case KEY_r:
00518     case KEY_s: case KEY_t: case KEY_u: case KEY_v: case KEY_w: case KEY_x:
00519     case KEY_y: case KEY_z:
00520 
00521     case KEY_A: case KEY_B: case KEY_C: case KEY_D: case KEY_E: case KEY_F:
00522     case KEY_G: case KEY_H: case KEY_I: case KEY_J: case KEY_K: case KEY_L:
00523     case KEY_M: case KEY_N: case KEY_O: case KEY_P: case KEY_Q: case KEY_R:
00524     case KEY_S: case KEY_T: case KEY_U: case KEY_V: case KEY_W: case KEY_X:
00525     case KEY_Y: case KEY_Z:
00526 
00527     case KEY_0: case KEY_1: case KEY_2: case KEY_3: case KEY_4: case KEY_5:
00528     case KEY_6: case KEY_7: case KEY_8: case KEY_9:
00529 
00530     case PLUS:
00531     case MINUS:
00532     case STAR:
00533     case SLASH:
00534     case LOWER_THAN:
00535     case GREATER_THAN:
00536     case EQUAL:
00537     case PERCENT:
00538 
00539     case SPACE:
00540     case UNDERSCORE:
00541     case AROBASE:
00542     case SHARP:
00543     case AMPERCENT:
00544     case DOLLAR:
00545     case BACKSLASH:
00546     case PIPE:
00547 
00548     case EXCLAMATION:
00549     case COLUMN:
00550     case DOT:
00551     case COMA:
00552     case SEMI_COLUMN:
00553     case QUOTE:
00554     case DOUBLE_QUOTE:
00555 
00556     case OPENING_BRACE:
00557     case CLOSING_BRACE:
00558     case OPENING_CURLY_BRACE:
00559     case CLOSING_CURLY_BRACE:
00560     case OPENING_BRACKET:
00561     case CLOSING_BRACKET:
00562         OnPrintableChar(E_KeyCode);
00563         break;
00564 
00565     default:
00566         break;
00567     }
00568 }
00569 
00570 void Shell::OnPrintableChar(const char C_KeyCode)
00571 {
00572     PrintLine(C_KeyCode);
00573 }
00574 
00575 void Shell::OnBackspace(void)
00576 {
00577     Backspace(1);
00578 }
00579 
00580 void Shell::OnEscape(void)
00581 {
00582     m_strLine.erase();
00583     GetStream(ECHO_STREAM) << endl;
00584     if (! m_vpcliMenus.empty())
00585     {
00586         PromptMenu();
00587     }
00588     else
00589     {
00590         assert(false);
00591         GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << "No current menu!" << endl;
00592     }
00593 }
00594 
00595 void Shell::OnExit(const bool B_Edition)
00596 {
00597     if (m_strLine.empty())
00598     {
00599         if (B_Edition)
00600         {
00601             GetStream(ECHO_STREAM) << endl;
00602         }
00603         if (! m_vpcliMenus.empty())
00604         {
00605             m_vpcliMenus.back()->OnExit();
00606             m_vpcliMenus.pop_back();
00607         }
00608         if (B_Edition)
00609         {
00610             PromptMenu();
00611         }
00612     }
00613     else
00614     {
00615         Beep();
00616     }
00617 }
00618 
00619 void Shell::OnHelp(const bool B_Edition, const bool B_HelpOnly)
00620 {
00621     if (! m_vpcliMenus.empty())
00622     {
00623         // Parse the command line.
00624         CommandLine cli_CommandLine;
00625         if (cli_CommandLine.Parse(*m_vpcliMenus.back(), m_strLine, false))
00626         {
00627             // Research matching elements.
00628             ElementList cli_Exact, cli_Elements;
00629             if (! cli_CommandLine.GetLastElement().FindElements(
00630                     cli_Exact, cli_Elements, cli_CommandLine.GetLastWord()))
00631             {
00632                 return;
00633             }
00634 
00635             // Initialize completion so far.
00636             std::string str_CompletionSoFar;
00637             // Determine whether help should be printed, and completion activated.
00638             bool b_PrintHelpList = false;
00639 
00640             if (B_HelpOnly)
00641             {
00642                 // Just print help.
00643                 b_PrintHelpList = true;
00644             }
00645             else
00646             {
00647                 // Print help and do completion depending on the possible nodes.
00648                 if (cli_Elements.empty())
00649                 {
00650                     // No matching element.
00651                     Beep();
00652                 }
00653                 else if ((cli_Elements.size() == 1)
00654                         && (! dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(cli_Elements.front()))
00655                         && (! dynamic_cast<const Param*>(cli_Elements.front())))
00656                 {
00657                     // Straight forward completion.
00658                     Backspace(cli_CommandLine.GetNumBackspacesForCompletion());
00659                     PrintLine(cli_Elements.front()->GetKeyword() + " ");
00660                 }
00661                 else
00662                 {
00663                     // Look for completion so far.
00664                     bool b_InitCompletionSoFar = true;
00665                     for (   ElementList::const_iterator it = cli_Elements.begin();
00666                             it != cli_Elements.end();
00667                             it ++)
00668                     {
00669                         if (dynamic_cast<const Param*>(*it)
00670                             || dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00671                         {
00672                             // No completion for parameters and end of lines.
00673                             str_CompletionSoFar.erase();
00674                             break;
00675                         }
00676                         else if (const Element* const pcli_Element = dynamic_cast<const Element*>(*it))
00677                         {
00678                             if (b_InitCompletionSoFar)
00679                             {
00680                                 // First initialization of str_CompletionSoFar.
00681                                 str_CompletionSoFar = pcli_Element->GetKeyword();
00682                                 b_InitCompletionSoFar = false;
00683                             }
00684                             else
00685                             {
00686                                 // Remove last character of str_CompletionSoFar till it matches the current keyword.
00687                                 while ( (! str_CompletionSoFar.empty())
00688                                         && (pcli_Element->GetKeyword().compare(0, str_CompletionSoFar.size(), str_CompletionSoFar) != 0))
00689                                 {
00690                                     str_CompletionSoFar = str_CompletionSoFar.substr(0, str_CompletionSoFar.size() - 1);
00691                                 }
00692                             }
00693                         }
00694                     }
00695 
00696                     // When no more completion so far available, print help.
00697                     if ((cli_CommandLine.GetLastWord() != NULL)
00698                         && (str_CompletionSoFar == cli_CommandLine.GetLastWord()))
00699                     {
00700                         b_PrintHelpList = true;
00701                     }
00702                 }
00703             }
00704 
00705             // Help display.
00706             if (b_PrintHelpList)
00707             {
00708                 // First of all, sort help elements on keywords.
00709                 class _ { public:
00710                     static const bool cmp(
00711                             const Element* const PCLI_1,
00712                             const Element* const PCLI_2)
00713                     {
00714                         return (PCLI_1->GetKeyword() < PCLI_2->GetKeyword());
00715                     }
00716                 };
00717                 std::sort(cli_Elements.begin(), cli_Elements.end(), _::cmp);
00718 
00719                 if (B_Edition)
00720                 {
00721                     GetStream(ECHO_STREAM) << endl;
00722                 }
00723 
00724                 // For each matching keyword...
00725                 for (   ElementList::const_iterator it = cli_Elements.begin();
00726                         it != cli_Elements.end();
00727                         it ++)
00728                 {
00729                     // Print the corresponding help.
00730                     PrintHelp(**it);
00731                 }
00732 
00733                 if (B_Edition)
00734                 {
00735                     PromptMenu();
00736                 }
00737             }
00738             // Completion so far.
00739             else if ((! B_HelpOnly) && (! str_CompletionSoFar.empty()))
00740             {
00741                 Backspace(cli_CommandLine.GetNumBackspacesForCompletion());
00742                 PrintLine(str_CompletionSoFar);
00743             }
00744         }
00745         else
00746         {
00747             if (B_Edition)
00748             {
00749                 GetStream(ECHO_STREAM) << endl;
00750             }
00751             GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << cli_CommandLine.GetLastError() << endl;
00752             if (B_Edition)
00753             {
00754                 PromptMenu();
00755             }
00756         }
00757     }
00758     else
00759     {
00760         assert(false);
00761         GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << "No current menu!" << endl;
00762     }
00763 }
00764 
00765 void Shell::OnExecute(void)
00766 {
00767     GetStream(ECHO_STREAM) << endl;
00768 
00769     if (! m_vpcliMenus.empty())
00770     {
00771         // First of all, store the line in history stack.
00772         PushHistory(m_strLine);
00773 
00774         CommandLine cli_CommandLine;
00775         if (cli_CommandLine.Parse(*m_vpcliMenus.back(), m_strLine + "\n", true))
00776         {
00777             bool b_Executed = false;
00778             if (cli_CommandLine.GetElementCount() > 1)
00779             {
00780                 if (const Menu* const pcli_Menu = m_vpcliMenus.back())
00781                 {
00782                     if (pcli_Menu->ExecuteReserved(cli_CommandLine))
00783                         b_Executed = true;
00784                     if (pcli_Menu->Execute(cli_CommandLine))
00785                         b_Executed = true;
00786                 }
00787 
00788                 if (b_Executed)
00789                 {
00790                     if (const Endl* pendl = dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& cli_CommandLine.GetLastElement()))
00791                     {
00792                         if (pendl->GetMenuRef() != NULL)
00793                         {
00794                             m_vpcliMenus.push_back(& pendl->GetMenuRef()->GetMenu());
00795                         }
00796                     }
00797                 }
00798                 else
00799                 {
00800                     GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << "Execution error" << endl;
00801                 }
00802             }
00803         }
00804         else
00805         {
00806             GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << cli_CommandLine.GetLastError() << endl;
00807         }
00808         m_strLine.erase();
00809         PromptMenu();
00810     }
00811     else
00812     {
00813         assert(false);
00814         GetStream(ERROR_STREAM) << "No current menu!" << endl;
00815     }
00816 }
00817 
00818 void Shell::OnHistory(const int I_Translation)
00819 {
00820     // First check the translation remains in bounds of the history stack.
00821     if ((m_iHistoryIndex + I_Translation >= 0)
00822         && (m_iHistoryIndex + I_Translation < (signed) m_vstrHistory.size()))
00823     {
00824         // If this is the current line, save it into the history stack.
00825         if (m_iHistoryIndex == 0)
00826         {
00827             m_vstrHistory[0] = m_strLine;
00828         }
00829         // Clean up the current line.
00830         Backspace(m_strLine.size());
00831         // Translate the history index.
00832         m_iHistoryIndex += I_Translation;
00833         // Print out this line.
00834         PrintLine(m_vstrHistory[m_iHistoryIndex]);
00835     }
00836     else
00837     {
00838         // Out of stack.
00839         Beep();
00840     }
00841 }
00842 
00843 void Shell::PrintLine(const std::string& STR_Append)
00844 {
00845     m_strLine += STR_Append;
00846     GetStream(ECHO_STREAM) << STR_Append;
00847 }
00848 
00849 void Shell::PrintLine(const char C_Append)
00850 {
00851     PrintLine(std::string() += C_Append);
00852 }
00853 
00854 void Shell::Backspace(const int I_BackspaceCount)
00855 {
00856     unsigned int i_BackspaceCount = I_BackspaceCount;
00857     if (i_BackspaceCount > m_strLine.size())
00858     {
00859         Beep();
00860         i_BackspaceCount = m_strLine.size();
00861     }
00862 
00863     m_strLine = m_strLine.substr(0, m_strLine.size() - i_BackspaceCount);
00864     for (unsigned int i=0; i<i_BackspaceCount; i++)
00865     {
00866         GetStream(ECHO_STREAM) << "\b" << " " << "\b";
00867     }
00868 }
00869 
00870 void Shell::PrintHelp(const Element& CLI_Element)
00871 {
00872     // Retrieve basic information.
00873     std::string str_Keyword = CLI_Element.GetKeyword();
00874     std::string str_Help = CLI_Element.GetHelp().GetHelp(GetLang());
00875 
00876     // Optional corrections.
00877     if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& CLI_Element))
00878     {
00879         str_Keyword = "<cr>";
00880     }
00881     else if (const Param* const pcli_Param = dynamic_cast<const Param*>(& CLI_Element))
00882     {
00883         if (const Param* const pcli_Clone = pcli_Param->Clone())
00884         {
00885             pcli_Clone->SetstrValue("");
00886             str_Keyword = pcli_Clone->GetKeyword();
00887             if (! pcli_Param->GetstrValue().empty())
00888             {
00889                 str_Keyword += ("(" + pcli_Param->GetstrValue() + ")");
00890             }
00891             delete pcli_Clone;
00892         }
00893     }
00894 
00895     // Display.
00896     unsigned int i = 0;
00897     for (i = 0; i < HELP_MARGIN; i++)
00898     {
00899         GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << " ";
00900     }
00901     GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << str_Keyword << " ";
00902     for (i = str_Keyword.size(); i < HELP_OFFSET; i++)
00903     {
00904         GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << " ";
00905     }
00906     GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << str_Help;
00907     GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << endl;
00908 }
00909 
00910 void Shell::Beep(void)
00911 {
00912     if (m_bBeep)
00913     {
00914         GetStream(ERROR_STREAM).Beep();
00915     }
00916 }
00917 
00918 void Shell::PushHistory(const std::string& STR_Line)
00919 {
00920     if (// Check the line is not empty.
00921         (! STR_Line.empty())
00922         // Check it is not the same as the previous one.
00923         && ((m_vstrHistory.size() < 2) || (STR_Line != m_vstrHistory[1])))
00924     {
00925         while (m_vstrHistory.size() > HISTORY_STACK_SIZE)
00926         {
00927             m_vstrHistory.pop_back();
00928         }
00929         m_vstrHistory[0] = STR_Line;
00930         m_vstrHistory.insert(m_vstrHistory.begin(), "");
00931     }
00932     m_iHistoryIndex = 0;
00933 }
